definition: ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: The hackers then follow their marks as they move to their online bank accounts.
sentences.chinese: 黑客就可以根據木馬留下的記號跟蹤他們的網銀賬號。

sentences.english: We advice parents to setup a separate user account for the children.
sentences.chinese: 建議父母爲孩子設置單獨的用戶賬號。

sentences.english: Numerous banking apps that could be used to capture and use account numbers and passwords.
sentences.chinese: 大量的銀行應用能夠獲取並使用賬號與密碼。

sentences.english: New sound when logging into pvp. net.
sentences.chinese: 新的登陸賬號時開門聲音。

sentences.english: Move your money from your checking account to a high-yield savings account.
sentences.chinese: 把錢從活期存款賬號上移到收益高的儲蓄賬戶上。

sentences.english: Users can buy refill card at retail and add credit to the pre-paid account.
sentences.chinese: 用戶可以購買充值卡，給預付費賬號充值。
建立一個網上託收賬號。

sentences.english: This account (reviewaccess) has been banned because of password sharing please contact customer support.
sentences.chinese: 意思是這個賬號已經被封停了，原因是太多共享。

sentences.english: I lost my account key. Is there a way I can get it back?
sentences.chinese: 我丟失了賬號密碼。有沒有方法再找回來？

sentences.english: Sorry, the account with this keycode was not found.
sentences.chinese: 對不起，賬號或密碼錯誤。

sentences.english: User accounts must be created on each cloud instance. The following shell code can be executed from a command-line PuTTY/SSH session on your new cloud instance to create a new user account
sentences.chinese: 必須在每個雲實例上創建用戶賬號。

sentences.english: But with that one swipe, I learn of the merchant's Twitter handle.
sentences.chinese: 但就是那麼一刷，讓我瞭解到商人的推特賬號。

sentences.english: The feed appears almost entirely made up of links to the Taliban website.
sentences.chinese: 賬號上出現的消息全部都是塔利班網站的鏈接。

sentences.english: You need to know precisely the account number and the account name of the other party.
sentences.chinese: 您需要準確無誤地知道對方的賬號和戶名。
所以啊，再次在“刪除我的賬號”上打鉤吧。

sentences.english: The installation problem is likely caused by User Account Control security measure.
sentences.chinese: 安裝問題可能是由用戶賬號控制安全措施引起的。

definition: binding (loanword)/to bind (e.g. an account to a mobile phone number)
email/abbr. for 電子郵件|电子邮件[dian4 zi3 you2 jian4]
Toutiao, personalized content recommendation app (abbr. for 今日頭條|今日头条[Jin1 ri4 Tou2 tiao2])
